lazeezMenuDisplay.title: Menu Lazeez (Vegan)
lazeezMenuDisplay.description: Hummus (chickpeas puree with tahini (sesame paste)). Moutabal (grilled eggplant caviar with tahini (sesame paste)). Foul moudamas (Fava beans marinated in lemon juice, tomatoes, cumin, garlic, olive oil and tahini sauce (sesame paste)). Muhammara (Dip of grilled red peppers, pomegranate molasses and walnuts). Warak enab (Vine leaves stuffed with rice and herbs, marinated in olive oil, mint and pomegranate molasses). Tabbouleh (Parsley, tomatoes, onion, lemon juice, bulgur, mint and olive oil). Batata harra (Fried potatoes cubes with red peppers, cilantro and garlic). Falafel x2 (deep-fried mashed chickpeas balls). Dessert x2: Aish el Saraya (sweeten biscuit, vegan pudding, orange blossom water and Pistachio).

veganEastWest.description: Hummus (chickpeas puree with tahini (sesame paste)). Moutabal (grilled eggplant caviar with tahini (sesame paste)). Batata harra (Fried potato cubes with red peppers, cilantro and garlic). Falafel x2 (deep-fried mashed chickpea balls). Dessert x2: Aish el Saraya (sweetened biscuit, vegan pudding, orange blossom water and pistachio).

about.title: Discover Lebanese Cuisine in Brussels
about.part1: Welcome to our website, celebrating the captivating world of Lebanese cuisine! At ” East @ West ” we are dedicated to present the rich flavors, vibrant colors, and cultural heritage of Lebanese culinary traditions, in the heart of Brussels!
about.part2: Lebanese cuisine is a true culinary masterpiece, fusing the best of Mediterranean, Arabic, and Levantine flavors. We invite you to embark on a journey that will introduce you to an array of aromatic spices, fresh ingredients, healthy meals and a diverse range of dishes that are as exquisite as they are satisfying.
about.heading: Chef Hanna!
about.paragraph1: Introducing Chef Hanna, the culinary mastermind behind the extraordinary flavors and culinary artistry at "East @ West" in Brussels. With a deep passion for Lebanese cuisine and a wealth of experience, Chef Hanna is the one behind the art of our dishes. With a background deeply rooted in Lebanese culinary traditions, he honed his skills in renowned kitchens and embraced the philosophy of using only the finest, freshest ingredients to create memorable culinary experiences.
about.paragraph2: With a background deeply rooted in Lebanese culinary traditions, he honed his skills in renowned kitchens and embraced the philosophy of using only the finest, freshest ingredients to create memorable culinary experiences. His culinary journey has taken him across Lebanon, where he learned from local chefs, delving into the rich tapestry of flavors, techniques, and cultural nuances that define Lebanese cuisine. Driven by a passion for exploring the diversity of Lebanese cuisine, Chef Hanna keeps experimenting with new ingredients, flavors, and cooking methods to elevate traditional recipes to modern culinary heights. His ability to balance flavors and create unique dining experiences has earned him accolades from both locals and visitors alike. Beyond his culinary expertise, Chef Hanna embodies the spirit of Lebanese hospitality. With a warm and welcoming demeanor, he strives to ensure that every guest feels at home in his restaurant. His dedication to providing exceptional service and creating memorable dining experiences is a testament to his commitment to excellence.

vegetarianPost.title: Vegetarian Restaurant Brussels – East @ West
vegetarianPost.excerpt: Meat, fish, and poultry are not served at vegetarian restaurant Brussels East @ West. Discover our diverse vegetarian options and the rich culinary heritage of Belgian plant-based cuisine.
